comparison.description: Determines how to compare the number of items in this stack to the specified value.
comparison.markdownDescription: Determines how to compare the number of items in this stack to the specified value.

compare_to.description: Which value to compare the item's count value to.
compare_to.markdownDescription: Which value to compare the item's count value to.

type.description:
## Amount

---



[Item Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/item_condition_types/amount)

Checks the amount of the item.

Type ID: `origins:amount`




---

### Examples

```json
"item_condition": {
    "type": "origins:amount",
    "comparison": ">=",
    "compare_to": 10
}
```

This example will check if the item has a count of 10 or more.
